en: Hey stop running around I finished setting it up
Oh calm down. It was only 10 minutes. Come look through it
Try looking around
In the first page of Grandpa’s book he wrote about the brightest star, do you see it?
That’s because it is, dummy
The book tells us how to find the constellation from there
It’s supposed to make out a fish
Man you suck at this, no wonder grandpa never took you stargazing
Relax, it’s a joke. You just have to look at it differently. Y’know, change your perspective
See? There you go. Says here grandpa found this one on the same night he got his biggest catch. Man I remember that fish, it was so good
Grandpa wrote more sticky notes in the journal, look at the page with the fish
of course you found it that fast
In the book this one is shaped like a Jellyfish
If you touch their underside the sting will hurt
Have you found the next one? The notes left seemed to have helped before
I remember seeing this one with grandpa once
Look again, try changing your perspective
This page must have been from when grandpa caught an octopus
Yup! He came over the next day still covered in ink it was hilarious
Let’s keep looking for the next one
This one must have been from the time grandpa got swallowed by a whale!
Okay fine, but he did see a huge one!
What are you talking about Kole? Stars don’t just appear
Lemme see… Oh wow I don’t remember this one. It seems way brighter than the others
No that’s not what I meant when-
*sigh* Yeah you’re right. It has to be.
It’s gonna be morning soon we gotta head back
Yeah, ‘course there is, it’s the sky. There’s also an empty spot in the book what are we supposed to do about that
